Name: CSMM-7DtD
Overview:
This Docker will install and download CSMM for 7DtD (CatalysmsServerManager).
It's a powerfull Server Manager with Server automation, Discord notifications, High ping kicker, Country ban, Player tracking, Ingame commands, Economy system, Discord integration, Support ticket system, Server analytics,... for 7DtD.

UPDATE NOTICE: Simply set the 'Force Update' to 'true' and restart the container (don't forget to turn it off after the update).
DonateText: If you like my work please

@attributes.Name: Hostname
@attributes.Description: Must be in this exact format: 'https://www.server.org' (without quotes, no path or locations allowed only subdomains and with no trailing '/').

@attributes.Name: Steam API Key
@attributes.Description: Steam API Key goes here (you can get it from: https://steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey).

@attributes.Name: Dicord Bot Token
@attributes.Description: Your Discord Bot Token (you can get it from here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications)

@attributes.Name: Discord Client Secret
@attributes.Description: Your Discord Client Secret (you can get it from here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications)

@attributes.Name: Discord Client ID
@attributes.Description: Your Discord Client ID (you can get it from here: https://discordapp.com/developers/applications)

@attributes.Name: Database Backup Interval
@attributes.Description: Specify the database backup interval in seconds (saved to the ../Database/7dtd.sql).

@attributes.Name: Force Update
@attributes.Description: Set to 'true' to force an update.

@attributes.Name: Web Port
@attributes.Description: Please note that you should reverse proxy the server trough nginx, apache or any other reverse proxy software to your Hostname as filled in above.

@attributes.Name: Maria DB Port
@attributes.Description: Only needed if you want to connect to the database.

@attributes.Name: CSMM Download URL
@attributes.Description: Only change if you are know what you are doing.
